segments.text: Would you help me figure out what to do about the office party ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would be happy to help . What would you like me to help with , food or entertainment ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would like to help you with both .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That will work out fine . To make sure everything goes together , do you think this party should be casual or dressy ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A dressy party would be fun !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That will work out fine . Do you think that Chinese or Continental food would be best ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that will work out fine . Should we hire a band or bring in a DJ ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Everything sounds great then ! I'll meet you back here on Friday to discuss the details .
segments.speaker: S2
